column4: anyone here familiar with Wincor Nixdorf ND210 printer <http://tinyurl.com/pn7jr> and on what driver to use in setting with CUPS connected as /dev/lp0?
where did you aquire a Wincor printer from?
I doubt you will be able to find a generic driver you will have to contact wincor themselves
I have a lot of experience with Wincor and they do things in some very strange ways
i already sent an e-mail but they don't know.. they just push on selling their own POS system which i don't need
I just finished consulting on a HUGE (one of the biggest in the world) POS/BOS rollouts this spring
it was for an oil company.  They just finished rolling out a new enterprise system in the UK and france
wow! i pressume that's a big project, right?  :)
about 100M USD worth of project yeah
were they trying to sell you their NAMOS system?
hehe I have soooo many manuals here for NAMOS :)
i'm trying to make this ND210 work on a customed linux based POS
